org.easylibs.options

Class ArgException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.easylibs.options.ArgException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InvalidArgException, UnrecognizedArgException

    public class ArgException
extends java.lang.Exception
    A checked base exception class for all exceptions related to parsing of the command line arguments.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
